Class Project

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.Project
public class Project extends Object
The Project class represents a Build-To-Order (BTO) housing project. It contains information about the project's details, available flat types, application period, and manages the relationships with officers, applicants, and their respective registrations and applications.

This class also handles flat availability tracking and eligibility checking for applicants.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project()
      Default constructor for Project. Initializes all collections, sets visibility to false, and creates a new ProjectFlats instance.

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String neighborhood, HDBManager managerInCharge)
      Parameterized constructor for Project. Creates a project with the specified name, neighborhood, and manager.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood where the project is located
      managerInCharge - The HDB manager responsible for this project

  • Method Details

    • initializeProjectFlats

      public void initializeProjectFlats()
      Initializes the flat units for this project. This method should be called after setting the flatTypeUnits map.

    • updateFlatTypeCount

      public boolean updateFlatTypeCount(FlatType flatType, int newCount)
      Updates the count of available flats for a specific flat type. This method is called by ProjectFlats when a flat is booked or released.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The type of flat
      newCount - The new count of available flats
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • bookFlat

      public int bookFlat(FlatType flatType)
      Books a flat of the specified type for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The type of flat to book
      Returns:
      The ID of the booked flat, or -1 if no flat of that type is available

    • releaseFlat

      public boolean releaseFlat(int flatId)
      Releases a previously booked flat.
      Parameters:
      flatId - The ID of the flat to release
      Returns:
      true if the flat was successfully released, false otherwise

    • getAvailableFlatCount

      public int getAvailableFlatCount(FlatType flatType)
      Gets the number of available flats of the specified type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The type of flat
      Returns:
      The number of available flats of the specified type

    • getEligibleFlatTypes

      public List<FlatType> getEligibleFlatTypes(User user)
      Determines which flat types a user is eligible to apply for based on their age and marital status. Singles age 35 and above are eligible for 2-Room flats only. Married couples age 21 and above are eligible for all flat types.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      A list of FlatType objects that the user is eligible to apply for

    • getDetails

      public String getDetails()
      Gets a formatted string containing details about this project. Includes project name, neighborhood, application period, and available flat types.
      Returns:
      A formatted string of project details

    • updateFlatAvailability

      public boolean updateFlatAvailability(FlatType flatType, int quantity)
      Updates the flat availability for a specific flat type directly. This method is kept for backward compatibility but now delegates to ProjectFlats.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The type of flat
      quantity - The new quantity of available flats
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility of this project. Visible projects can be seen and applied to by eligible applicants.
      Parameters:
      visible - The new visibility status to set
      Returns:
      true indicating the operation was successful

    • getProjectEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getProjectEnquiries()
      Gets a list of all enquiries related to this project. Alias for getEnquiries() for backward compatibility.
      Returns:
      List of Enquiry objects for this project

    • getApprovedOfficers

      public List<HDBOfficer> getApprovedOfficers()
      Gets a list of all HDB officers with approved registrations for this project.
      Returns:
      List of HDBOfficer objects with approved registrations

    • getProjectName

      public String getProjectName()
      Gets the name of this project.
      Returns:
      The project name

    • setProjectName

      public void setProjectName(String projectName)
      Sets the name of this project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name to set

    • getNeighborhood

      public String getNeighborhood()
      Gets the neighborhood where this project is located.
      Returns:
      The neighborhood

    • setNeighborhood

      public void setNeighborhood(String neighborhood)
      Sets the neighborhood where this project is located.
      Parameters:
      neighborhood - The neighborhood to set

    • getFlatTypeUnits

      public Map<FlatType,Integer> getFlatTypeUnits()
      Gets the map of flat types to the number of units available for each type.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are FlatType objects and values are the number of units

    • setFlatTypeUnits

      public void setFlatTypeUnits(Map<FlatType,Integer> flatTypeUnits)
      Sets the map of flat types to the number of units available for each type. Also initializes the project flats with the new units.
      Parameters:
      flatTypeUnits - The map of flat types to units to set

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if this project is visible to applicants.
      Returns:
      true if the project is visible, false otherwise

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Sets the visibility of this project.
      Parameters:
      visible - The visibility status to set

    • getTotalOfficerSlots

      public int getTotalOfficerSlots()
      Gets the total number of slots available for HDB officers for this project. This represents the maximum capacity, while availableHDBOfficerSlots represents the currently available slots.
      Returns:
      The total number of officer slots

    • setTotalOfficerSlots

      public void setTotalOfficerSlots(int totalSlots)
      Sets the total number of slots available for HDB officers for this project.
      Parameters:
      totalSlots - The total number of officer slots to set
